snippet: The Senate approved the nomination of John O. Brennan as director of the Central Intelligence Agency by a vote of 63 to 34.
lead_paragraph: The Senate approved the nomination of John O. Brennan as director of the Central Intelligence Agency by a vote of 63 to 34.

headline.seo: Senate Confirms Brennan as C.I.A. Chief
headline.main: Brennan Confirmed to Lead the C.I.A.
headline.print_headline: Senate Confirms Brennan as C.I.A. Chief
